name: unraw
description: Convert raw escape sequences to their respective characters (undo String.raw).

scripts.minify: node-minify --compressor uglify-es --input dist/index.js --output dist/index.min.js & node-minify --compressor uglify-es --input dist/errors.js --output dist/errors.min.js
scripts.testWithCoverage: npm run build && nyc --reporter=text mocha src/**/*.test.ts --require ts-node/register --require source-map-support/register
scripts.check: npm run build && npm run testForCheck && npm run lint
scripts.ensureCleanTree: echo 'Checking to ensure all changes are committed...' && git diff --quiet --exit-code & git diff --quiet --cached --exit-code
scripts.prepublishOnly: npm run ensureCleanTree && npm run check && npm run minify
scripts.postpublish: cross-var git tag -a $npm_package_version -m "See changelog.md for release notes." && git push --tags && cross-var git tag -d $npm_package_version
